articles.title: The Debate Club: Cristiano Ronaldo or Bruno Fernandes - Who is Portugal's main man at Euro 2020? - Goal.com
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.
